name: TrackingPackage
description:
track ups, fedex,usps and DHL packages.
Windows store app available → https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9PHP0Z68X02N?cid=rapidAPI

api_methods.name: TrackingPackage
api_methods.description: Track UPS, USPS and FedEx packages.
